channel.title: Help Stopping cheat clients and more
channel.description: I did this TUT : [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,444519.0.html]https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,444519.0.html[/url] To stop cheat clients and etc. so I did it and got no error(s) BUT it didnt let my client go on I got the uid right for sure So i tried to take it off but it still didn't work here's how it is for my server : [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/15430412/Help%201%20uid.png[/img] client : client.java : [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/15430412/Help%20client.java%20client%20side.png[/img] client: signlink.java : [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/15430412/signlink.png[/img] Help would be appreciated thanks and by the way I want to remove it.
